name: Advanced Physics Laboratory
description: A comprehensive physics lab equipped with modern instrumentation for mechanics, optics, thermodynamics, and quantum physics experiments.
equipment: Oscilloscopes, Spectrometers, Laser Systems, Force Sensors, Data Acquisition Systems, Safety Equipment
safety_requirements: Lab coat required, Safety goggles mandatory, Completed safety training

name: Molecular Biology Research Station
description: Specialized facility for molecular and cellular biology research with sterile environments and precision equipment.
equipment: PCR Machines, Centrifuges, Microscopes, Incubators, Biosafety Cabinets, pH Meters
safety_requirements: Biohazard training completed, Lab coat and gloves required, No food or drink

name: Makerspace & Prototyping Lab
description: A collaborative workspace for engineering projects, rapid prototyping, and hands-on innovation with fabrication tools.
equipment: 3D Printers, Laser Cutters, Soldering Stations, Arduino Kits, Power Tools, CAD Workstations
safety_requirements: Tool safety certification, Closed-toe shoes required, Safety glasses mandatory

name: Computer Science Lab
description: High-performance computing lab with advanced workstations for programming, AI/ML projects, and software development.
equipment: High-end Workstations, GPU Servers, Software Licenses (MATLAB, Python, R), Virtual Reality Systems, Network Testing Equipment
safety_requirements: Valid student ID required, No unauthorized software installation

name: Chemistry Prep & Analysis Room
description: A specialized space for chemical analysis, sample preparation, and small-scale synthesis experiments.
address: 10 Science Circle, University Campus, UK SW1A 2AA
equipment: Analytical Balances, FTIR Spectrometer, UV-Vis Spectrophotometer, Fume Hoods, Glassware, Chemical Storage
safety_requirements: Chemical safety training mandatory, Lab coat and goggles required, Closed-toe shoes only
